sources.title: Monster A.K.A. Monstroid
sources.description: Based on a true story, a monster invades Columbia. As Featured on Elvira's Movie Macabre http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0079573/ The file marked "VHSRip" is from a tape in my personal collection which I thought was taped from Tv... until they started dropping "F-Bombs"... so I'm not sure where I got that. The 700mb file is from a tape a friend of mine had that he bought recently because I told him I liked the movie. The 700mb file is better quality and resolution.
